hackathon-rules:
If you're a minor, please identify yourself upon sign-up as we will require parental or legal guardian consent to participate.
Teams cannot post a Submission that has been publicly available as of the Competition start date.
Team size should be less than 5 individuals
You can read our Code of Conduct 
.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1801 Kalakaua Ave, Honolulu, HI 96815, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Potential to positively impact the community as relevant to each respective Challenge pitch (25%)
Quality of concept, including creativity, originality and commercial viability (25%)
Implementation of the idea (including user experience and design) (25%)
Diversity of team and ability to leverage each others skills (25%)

hackathon-description-header: Hackathon for high schools to help solve community challenges
